PAD_DominatedCharacterCombat.synopsis: Paladin PAD if they fight an undead they controlled previously after a long rest.
PAD_DominatedCharacterCombat.how_to_trigger: Control an undead with Control Undead, take a long rest, and attack the undead. This will only trigger when they are both in combat and the player's turn starts.

PAD_DominatedCharacterCombat_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DominatedCharacterCombat_0.text: That's it - you're done for now.
